biography.content: Yaolin Zhang, currently is a chemist & senior scientist in Cellulose Biomaterials Department of FPInnovations.  He obtained his BSc and MSc in Polymer Materials from Sichuan University (former Chengdu University of Science and Technology) in 1985 and 1988 respectively, and his PhD in Chemical Engineering from Laval University in 2003. He was a NSERC postdoctoral fellowship award holder from 2004 to 2006. From 1994 to 1999, he worked at China International Chemical Consulting Corporation as chemical engineer and consultant. From 1988 to 1993, he worked at Beijing University of Chemical Technology. He specializes in polymer fiber composites, wood composites,  green adhesive developments, and publishes over 70 papers in peer reviewed scientific journals and international conferences, and several patent & patent applications

keyword.content: Composites, Wood Adhesives, Foams, Polyurethane, Phenolic resin
